description: This source file is a server-side entry point for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests, rendering server responses, and managing bot detection for SSR rendering.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main entry function to handle incoming HTTP requests, distinguish between bot and browser requests, and delegate to appropriate handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests using React's renderToPipeableStream, streaming the response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, similar to handleBotRequest, but optimized for human browsers.
